{"title":"Welcome to Perseus!","content":"

Welcome to Perseus!

Home • Crate Page • API Documentation • Contributing

Welcome to the Perseus documentation! Here, you'll find guides on how to use Perseus, as well as documentation for specific features and plenty of examples! Note that every code snippet in these docs comes from something in the examples, where you can get context from real-world code.

If you like Perseus, please consider giving us a star on GitHub!
